title: Generative Meta-Learning Robust Quality-Diversity Portfolio. (arXiv:2307.07811v1 [cs.NE])
abstract: This paper proposes a novel meta-learning approach to optimize a robust portfolio ensemble. The method uses a deep generative model to generate diverse and high-quality sub-portfolios combined to form the ensemble portfolio. The generative model consists of a convolutional layer, a stateful LSTM module, and a dense network. During training, the model takes a randomly sampled batch of Gaussian noise and outputs a population of solutions, which are then evaluated using the objective function of the problem. The weights of the model are updated using a gradient-based optimizer. The convolutional layer transforms the noise into a desired distribution in latent space, while the LSTM module adds dependence between generations. The dense network decodes the population of solutions. The proposed method balances maximizing the performance of the sub-portfolios with minimizing their maximum correlation, resulting in a robust ensemble portfolio against systematic shocks. translated_title: 生成式元学习——鲁棒多样化组合投资组合
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种新颖的元学习方法以优化鲁棒的组合投资组合。该方法使用深度生成模型生成多样化且高质量的子投资组合，然后将它们组合成集合投资组合。生成模型包括卷积层、有状态LSTM模块和稠密网络。在训练过程中，模型接受随机抽样的高斯噪声批量并输出一群解决方案，然后使用问题的目标函数对其进行评估。模型的权重通过基于梯度的优化器进行更新。卷积层将噪声转化为潜空间中的目标分布，而LSTM模块增加了生成之间的依赖关系。稠密网络解码了解决方案的群体。所提出的方法在最大化子投资组合的性能和最小化它们之间的最大相关性之间取得了平衡，从而得到了一个对系统性冲击具有鲁棒性的集合投资组合。
tldr: 这篇论文提出了使用生成式元学习方法优化鲁棒多样化组合投资组合的新方法。它通过生成多样化且高质量的子投资组合，并将其组合成集合投资组合，从而平衡了最大化性能和最小化相关性，以获得对系统性冲击具有鲁棒性的结果。
